summary: a total of 144 adult HCT recipients with 166 episodes of HCoV infections were analyzed. the most common HCoV serotype for LRI and URI was 229E (42.4%) and OC43 (37.6%), respectively. most patients were infected between November and March each year. HCT recipients with HCoV LRI were more likely to have a fatal outcome. the NPV of the ISI for progression to LRI was high.
